casebody.data:
CROWN ENTERPRISES, INC., DIBDetroit LLC, Riverview-Trenton Railroad Company, Central Transport LLC, and Detroit International Bridge Company, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
STATE of Michigan, Governor, Department of Transportation, and Michigan Strategic Fund, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157971
COA: 340039 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 28, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's December 21, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that reconsideration of our previous order is warranted. MCR 7.311(G).

CLEMENT , J., did not participate due to her prior involvement as chief legal counsel for the Governor.
